name: Pop Up Mania
description:
Welcome to Pop Ups Mania, The Game is quite simple yet challenging.

Pop Ups will randomly appear on your screen which have to be popped, what you click to pop them depends on the pop up, if you let one unpopped for too long, You will lose!

The game gets progressively harder the longer you play

Popping Pop Ups will give you money, use the money to buy upgrades and even gain the ability to simply drag over Pop Ups to pop them instead of clicking them, and one that prevents you from making mistakes

Pop Ups and what to click:-

1.Red: Left mouse button

2.Green: Right mouse button

3.Blue: Middle mouse button or Q (for laptop peeps)

4.Orange: Any thing of the 3 above, but only lasts 3 seconds!

5.Golden: Any thing of the 3 above, Extra Money

you can exit the game at anytime by pressing the Escape key

There is a color blind option that adds letters to the pop ups, and a setting to turn off my horrible fantastic music!

This game was made for the Gmtk 2020 game jam, where I had to make the game in 2 days, the theme was out of control, my game fits the theme by slowly increasing the chance of pop ups appearing every frame making you eventually miss them

This was an interesting experience!

-Eyad
